data.name: 0000 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I stayed behind with Asahina on lookout duty by the music room.

data.name: 0001 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Let's do our best to keep an eye out, Kyon.

data.name: 0002 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Actually, Asahina, we're not going to be doing lookout.

data.name: 0003 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Oh? R-really?

data.name: 0004 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I had a hunch, but she really didn't understand after all.

data.name: 0005 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Since we've been seperated from Haruhi we should make the best use of this time.

data.name: 0006 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Oh, right, that makes sense. Sorry for not realizing.

data.name: 0007 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Phew—looks like I was able to get her to understand.

data.name: 0008 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, about what we're going to be doing then.

data.name: 0009 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah, yes. We have to keep Suzumiya distracted, right?

data.name: 0010 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, we have to draw her attention to something else so she doesn't go on a rampage.

data.name: 0011 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Do you have any good ideas, Asahina?

data.name: 0012 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Draw her attention to something… Hmm, right.

data.name: 0013 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's even adorable in deep thought.

data.name: 0014 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, maybe instead of the seven wonders of North High…

data.name: 0015 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: We could tell her about ghost stories from somewhere else?

data.name: 0016 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …Though even just listening to ghost stories is scary…

data.name: 0017 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I just thought it would be nice if it caught Suzumiya's attention…

data.name: 0018 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see. So you're saying we could draw her attention to somewhere else, right.

data.name: 0019 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't think that's a bad idea.

data.name: 0020 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well then, what should we tell her about?

data.name: 0021 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, if you don't mind a story I know, I can run it through with you?

data.name: 0022 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay, what kind of story is it?

data.name: 0023 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She somewhat timidly leaned closer.

data.name: 0024 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, it's a pretty common story.

data.name: 0025 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There are these ruins in a somewhat isolated place.

data.name: 0026 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0R-right…

data.name: 0027 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just hearing the word "ruins," she's shaking like she's enduring the cold.

data.name: 0028 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If you wander in them, an extremely terrifying unnatural phenomenon will…

data.name: 0029 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hyaa?! A-a terrifying unnatural phenomenon—?

data.name: 0030 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: And that is…

data.name: 0031 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Ahhh—! I-it turns out I don't need to hear it. Please don't tell me—

data.name: 0032 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The fear filled Asahina's eyes with “#P05tears#P01.”

data.name: 0033 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: S-sorry.

data.name: 0034 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I didn't think it was that scary personally…

data.name: 0035 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But it scares Asahina, so I'll leave it at that.

data.name: 0036 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What about you, Asahina—do you know any story that might grab Haruhi's attention?

data.name: 0037 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eh, m-me?

data.name: 0038 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, there must be at least one or two ghost stories in the future as well, right?

data.name: 0039 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm, there are… but the details are <classified information>.

data.name: 0040 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I couldn't tell you any of them on this time plane.

data.name: 0041 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I-is that so…

data.name: 0042 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Sorry for hopelessly asking.

data.name: 0043 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Um, it's just an example… but if we want to keep Suzumiya away…

data.name: 0044 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Couldn't we make up our own story?

data.name: 0045 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Like something sensationalized to get her attention and set up to draw her away?

data.name: 0046 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yeah, something like—if you get close to it something bad will happen.

data.name: 0047 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …My idea's no good, right?

data.name: 0048 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If we mess up, we'll only end up stimulating her interest even more.

data.name: 0049 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: R-really?

data.name: 0050 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Like, if you get close you'll get cursed and something terrifying will appear.

data.name: 0051 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: …Actually, now I say that maybe it really is a bad idea.

data.name: 0052 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, I'm not sure about a mere high school music room having an ancient curse…

data.name: 0053 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Oh, so it is weird…

data.name: 0054 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But, if I heard something like that I would definitely be too scared to get close…

data.name: 0055 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …If only Haruhi had even 1 gram of your sensitivity, Asahina.

data.name: 0056 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not that I ever wanted to get into this situation in the first place.

data.name: 0057 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Eek. Just by imagining it I'm suddenly feeling scared…

data.name: 0058 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even though she came up with it on her own.

data.name: 0059 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina was shaking like a lamb in her fear.

data.name: 0060 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's such a pretty sight, but…

data.name: 0061 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd better calm her down, right?

data.name: 0062 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, no matter how you're put it, you're definitely overthinking this.

data.name: 0063 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: R-really?

data.name: 0064 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, just think about it. In the first place, that was something you came up with.

data.name: 0065 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah—y-you're right.

data.name: 0066 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Silly me—getting all swept up in it…

data.name: 0067 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She gave an embarrassed smile.

data.name: 0068 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Looks like she's calmed down though.

data.name: 0069 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's okay, there's nothing scary—It's all the product of your imagination.

data.name: 0070 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Y-yeah… That's right.

data.name: 0071 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm sorry Kyon—I'm just such a scaredy-cat.

data.name: 0072 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No no no, being a scaredy-cat…

data.name: 0073 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: To tell the truth—it's good, and it's very Asahina.

data.name: 0074 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Phew—I was able to calm down thanks to you, Kyon.

data.name: 0075 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm still a little hesitant about going in the room.

data.name: 0076 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We were standing outside the music room, but…

data.name: 0077 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina was hesitant about looking inside.

data.name: 0078 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, I can't really blame you.

data.name: 0079 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm going to take a look inside, so you stay right there, Asahina.

data.name: 0080 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay…

data.name: 0081 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just when I thought I'd take a look inside the classroom…

data.name: 0082 (394.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Mikuru~!

data.name: 0083 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Hyaaa—?!

data.name: 0084 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wha—?!

data.name: 0085 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Where have you been hiding all this time, little sister.

data.name: 0086 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With frighteningly perfect timing, my little sister jumped onto Asahina's back.

data.name: 0087 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0S-s-s-s-something genuinely appeared… Eek…

data.name: 0088 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina fainted from the shock.

data.name: 0089 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ahh—! Asahina, are you okay—?!

data.name: 0090 (394.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Huh? What's with Mikuru?

data.name: 0091 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Awawa… Sorry… I'm really not good with scary stuff…

data.name: 0092 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She got her story—Actually, in this case you'd say she got what she had coming.

data.name: 0093 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If you get this overwhelmed by your own imagination, that is.

data.name: 0094 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What an elegant person.

data.name: 0095 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Asahina—if you're so bad with scary things…

data.name: 0096 (394.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …maybe try not to imagine them too much.

data.name: 0097 (394.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Oof… you're right…

data.name: 0098 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't think Haruhi will be convinced…

data.name: 0099 (394.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …before Asahina loses her own cool…

data.name: 0100 (394.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Tell your own story

data.name: 0101 (394.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Ask Mikuru

data.name: 0102 (394.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Tell her she's overthinking

data.name: 0103 (394.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Encourage her by telling her it's not scary
